title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 3 ยง 321.7 - Loans to executive officers and directors of bank holding companies
content:
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 3 ยง 321.7 - Loans to executive officers and directors of bank holding companies

State Regulations
(a) The provisions
of sections
321.1
(b), 321.2, 321.3 and
321.4
of this Part shall apply to
any loan made by a bank subsidiary of a bank holding company to an executive
officer or director of the bank holding company. (b) The provisions of section
321.6
of this Part shall apply to
any director of a bank holding company who becomes obligated on any loan or
extension of credit to any banking subsidiary of a bank holding
company. Notes
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 3
ยง
321.7

State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
